page.title: 02THE ARMED FORCES IN PANTON
page.content: {PANTON}is a quiet backwater which happens to be designated by the military forces as an A.I.A.A. which means an area of intense aerial activity. The residents are subjected to frequent flights of extremely fast, low flying military aircraft such as Phantoms & Tornados from R.A.F. Coningsby to the S.E. Lightnings from R.A.F. Binbrook to the N.E. Red Arrows from R.A.F. Scampton to th N.W. Nimrod & A.W.A.C.s from R.A.F. Waddington to the S.W. Also the influence of the United States is felt over{PANTON}with the frequent flights of A lOs from Bentwaters in Suffolk . Other aircraft include Jaguars, Fllls and Harriers. The noise can be startling and their presence is disturbing and unwelcome.
